page.title: 08MAGLEV
page.content: THE MAGLEV SYSTEM COST 4 MILLION POUNDS AND TOOK ONE YEAR TO BUILD. THE MAXIMUM WAITING TIME BETWEEN CARS IS ONLY 2mins. THE TRAVELLER,USING MAGLEV AND INTER-CITY RAILWAY SERVICES,CAN BE IN BIRMINGHAM CITY CENTRE WITHIN 10mins OF LEAVING THE AIRPORT. THERE IS VIRTUALLY NO NOISE,NO MOVING PARTS TO WEAR-OUT AND THERE IS NO NEED FOR TRACK MAINTENANCE.EACH CAR WORKS AN 20 HOUR DAY,AND A LONG-TERM AIM IS TO CARRY 3,200 PASSENGERS EVERY HOUR. THE MAGLEV METHOD OF TRANSPORT IS THE ONLY ONE OF ITS KIND IN THE COUNTRY. RIDING ON MAGLEV, IT FELT LIKE THE CARRIAGE WAS FLOATING AS IT LIFTED UP. THE RIDE WAS SMOOTH AND FAST.THE CARRIAGE SLOWED DOWN TO GO ROUND THE BEND.WE LIKED THE RIDE.
